examples: The breeze rustled the papers on her desk.

definitions.definition: ( figurative ) Any activity that is easy , not testing or difficult .
examples: After studying Latin, Spanish was a breeze .

definitions.definition: ( cricket ) Wind blowing across a cricket match , whatever its strength .
An excited or ruffled state of feeling; a flurry of excitement; a disturbance; a quarrel.
A brief workout for a racehorse .

secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Any activity that is easy , not testing or difficult .

An excited or ruffled state of feeling; a flurry of excitement; a disturbance; a quarrel.

definitions.definition: A gadfly ; a horsefly ; a strong-bodied dipterous insect of the family Tabanidae .

main_definition: A gadfly ; a horsefly ; a strong-bodied dipterous insect of the family Tabanidae .

definitions.definition: Ashes and residue of coal or charcoal, usually from a furnace. See Wikipedia article on Clinker .

main_definition: Ashes and residue of coal or charcoal, usually from a furnace. See Wikipedia article on Clinker .
